code: export var getRemainedTime=function getRemainedTime(){var nowDate=new Date();var announcementDate=new Date(nowDate.getFullYear(),nowDate.getMonth(),nowDate.getDate(),20,45);announcementDate.setDate(nowDate.getDate()+Math.abs(6-nowDate.getDay()));return announcementDate.getTime()-nowDate.getTime();};
